author: The Linux Foundation
description:
Don't miss out! Join us at the next Open Source Summit in Seoul, South Korea (November 4-5). Join us at the premier vendor-neutral open source conference, where developers and technologists come together to collaborate, share knowledge, and explore the latest innovations and advancements in open source technology. Learn more at https://events.linuxfoundation.org/

In today's software development ecosystem, managing and ensuring the security of dependencies is more crucial than ever. A Software Bill of Materials provides a comprehensive inventory of the components within a software product. However, the effectiveness of a SBOM is contingent on its accuracy, completeness, adherence to standards and future legal requirements.

This presentation introduces SEPIA (SBOM Exchange Procedures, Interfaces and Architecture) validator, a tool designed to automatically verify the integrity and compliance of SBOMs against a defined schema in SPDX and CycloneDX formats. It can also edit a SBOM and m
title: SEPIA - Validate your SBOM and More - Nikola Babadzhanov & Rakesh Prabhakaran
